tool_description: Our API offers the ability to check if a phone number or email is valid or disposable. Additionally, it can verify if an IP address is a VPN or proxy, which is useful during KYC procedures or lead registration.

api_list.name: IP Verification
api_list.description: Check IP details for supporting IPv4 and IPv6.

api_list.name: Email Verification
api_list.description: Verifies email against RFC standards, checks if it's from a disposable/temporary email service, and checks for MX records to ensure the client provides a correct/valid domain name.

api_list.name: Validate Phone Number
api_list.description: Checks the provided phone number for disposable services and verifies if the phone is mentioned in public resources, which affects the reputation score.
